page.title: 10Recreation in Fauldhouse
page.content: As well as catering for many sports the clubs run a social programme. The {Miner's Welfare, Cricket, {Bowling & Golf} clubs run dances each weekend. Two dances are held in the Miners welfare. On a{Friday}evening it is a disco type dance to suit younger people and on a{Saturday}evening it is mainly more formal dance like Waltzes and quicksteps etc. On a {Sunday} evening there is a Cabaret show in the Welfare. A concert is held on a {Thursday,}or old Time dancing .{Tuesday and Wednesday} are evenings for{Bingo.}The proceeds from one helps to support the{Youth Brass {Band} and the other supports the {Amateur Football Club.}A whist evening is held in the Cricket Club. When the clubs are not being used in this way they are used for weddings and other functions.
